statement.p: Find the slope of the line that goes through the points (4,-5) and (2,4).
Enter your answer as an integer or a reduced fraction in the form A/B

ul.li: \displaystyle\frac{{{4}-{\left(-{5}\right)}}}{{{2}-{\left({4}\right)}}}=\frac{{9}}{{-{{2}}}} which reduces to \displaystyle-\frac{{9}}{{2}} (if it's not already reduced)
